EmailTemplate.description: When Companies House rejects a transaction
EmailTemplate.name: CH DS02 Rejected Transaction
EmailTemplate.subject: Application to close rejected for {!Transaction__c.CompanyName__c}({!Transaction__c.CompanyNumber__c}) Ref: FE{!Transaction__c.Id}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Companies House rejection confirmation
Request to cancel the application to close {!Transaction__c.CompanyName__c}
Your request to cancel the application to close {!Transaction__c.CompanyName__c}({!Transaction__c.CompanyNumber__c}) whose registered office address is {!Transaction__c.CompanyAddress1__c} {!Transaction__c.CompanyPostCode__c} has been rejected for the following reason(s). Your reference number for any future enquiries is FE{!Transaction__c.Id}.
{!Transaction__c.ErrorDescription__c}
The process to close the company has not been stopped. The company will be closed within two months of the notice to close being published in the relevant Gazette.
Click to download a copy of your application
What happens next
If you still wish to close this company, then you will need to start the process again with a new application to cancel the application to close.
Contact Centre tel +44 (0)303 1234 500 or email enquiries@companieshouse.gov.uk.
This email was sent from a notification-only email address which cannot accept incoming mail. Please do not reply directly to this message.
